name: Antisyphon - Securing The Cloud: Foundations
description: In the Securing the Cloud: Foundations course from Antisyphon, you will get to know the basic topics of security in cloud systems. This course examines the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform and takes a look at securing a startup company on this platform with a practical approach that prepares you to design a secure structure for such companies. This course introduces the audience to ideas such as security through basic settings and examines the service and routes used to lock down basic security breaches of this platform. Finally, the participants of this course will gain basic knowledge about controlling, identifying and protecting cloud systems.

name: ZeroPointSecurity - Red Team Ops
description: Red Team Ops is an online course that teaches the basic principles, tools and techniques, that are synonymous with red teaming.
